TopicTitle: How to have Realism Overhaul without the launch complex management.

Articles.Content: I would like to play realism overhaul, but having to manage the launch complex is aggravating. How can I turn that specific mod(s) off and which one? I just want to play KSP with realistic parts included and also a realistic solar system. Can someone please show me how to do this. Thank you very much

I would like to play realism overhaul, but having to manage the launch complex is aggravating. How can I turn that specific mod(s) off and which one? I just want to play KSP with realistic parts included and also a realistic solar system. Can someone please show me how to do this? Thank you very much. I posted this elsewhere but never received a comment.
Overlapping threads have been merged. (Sorry, I don't use this mod or would try to help.)
I figured it out. Just use sandbox mode, not career. haha.
